FlipCam //For Permission No Permission Unavailability of permissions will render FlipCam not to function correctly.

 Please reopen the application or go to Settings, if you wish to grant permission. EXIT /FlipCam/ /FC_VID_ /FC_IMG_ .mp4 .jpeg .jpg yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss MMddHHmmss KB MB GB 00 : 00 : 00 0 MB VIDEO PHOTO MODE VIDEO SAVED IMAGE SAVED No Photos or Videos Delete Media Do you want to delete the Photo/Video? There seems to be no Internet Connection. Please check your connection, or enable Wi-Fi and try again. OK Cancel Share Media Upload to Facebook Connection Failure How would you like to share? The media will be uploaded to Facebook CONTINUE Media queued for upload. Please check notification bar for progress. YOU HAVE BEEN LOGGED OUT OF FACEBOOK LOGOUT OF FACEBOOK Permission for Facebook WhatsApp not available WhatsApp needs to be installed to be able to share Photos/Videos to another WhatsApp contact. Upload to Facebook FlipCam requires you to login to Facebook to request below permission(s) to upload Photos/Videos: You have an option to logout before you upload. publish_actions LOGIN TO FACEBOOK NOT NOW Facebook WhatsApp 308890512940081 fb308890512940081 FlipCam Media Upload Service No internet connection.
